share on x ds de. loach-mc. kerley-prescott funeral home and cremation service. jun 10 at 3:21 pm created a tribute video in memory of virginia elizabeth posey carter comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jc jane cobb. jun 10 at 3:27 pm i am so thankful i had the time to have mrs. carter for my friend when she lived in greensboro. i loved seeing her at willow run retirement home as we sang old favorite hymns and she knew all the words by heart. she was always so happy to have a visitor. i visited her recently and got such a happy smile and had a nice talk. i am sorry to have to miss her service. but send my love and sympathy and prayers across the miles to the family. love, jane cobb, greensboro, gacomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 11. 5:00 pm - 7:00 pm de. loach-mc. kerley-prescott funeral home and cremation service220 east 6th st. po box 595. waynesboro, ga, us, 30830. get funeral service. jun 12. 11:00 am rosemont baptist church522 hwy 25 north. waynesboro, ga, us, 30830. get tribute video wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook de. loach-mc. kerley-prescott funeral home and cremation service website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about
